# Literature Review {-}

This is where you can include a lit review if you don't whish for it to be an individual chapter or to be numbered. To make sure that a section heading is not numbered use the `{-}` notation beside the header text like this:

_**rmarkdown**_:

```markdown
# Literature Review {-}

This is where you can include a lit review if you don't whish for it to be an individual chapter or to be numbered. To make sure that a section heading is not numbered use the `{-}` notation beside the header text like this:
```
